overview:
Jordan is a Senior Associate at Genacast Ventures, representing the firm in New York City.

Jordan has played a variety of roles in the start-up ecosystem. During the dot-com era he worked as a Java developer, patent engineer and marketer for various Israeli start-ups. From 2004 to 2005 he performed all channel partner-facing technical functions at family remittance start-up UniTeller, from pre-sale to integration to operations, leading to their subsequent exit. More recently Jordan looked at start-up acquisitions in the IT consulting and BPO space as Director, Corporate Development at Headstrong; and advised seed-stage digital media and ecommerce startups on navigating the financing landscape.

Jordan holds a BA in Computer Science and International Relations from Brown University and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, where he was on the Deanâ€™s List.
